data.title: Mogherini announces five high
data.text:
The High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, Federica Mogherini, announced the appointment of senior officials in the European External Action Service (EEAS) in a statement on Thursday 5 September.

Pawel Herczynski from Poland has been appointed Managing Director for Common Security and Defence Policy (CSDP) and Crisis Response.

Stefano Tomat, an Italian national, takes up the position of Director for Integrated Approach for Security and Peace, and his...
